com.sri.modules.httpd
Class Httpd

java.lang.Object
  com.sri.kernel.modules.DefaultModule
      com.sri.modules.httpd.Httpd
All Implemented Interfaces:
HttpConstants, Module, java.lang.Runnable
public class Httpd
extends DefaultModule
implements HttpConstants, java.lang.Runnable

This is a simple web server to serve HTML pages.

Version:
1.5
Author:
Joseph Monti, Smart Robots

Method Detail

initModule

public boolean initModule(ModuleData md)
Initializes the module, setting the document root, port on which to listen, and creates an access an error log. It also initiates the thread for listening to connecting clients.

Specified by:
initModule in interface Module
Overrides:
initModule in class DefaultModule
Parameters:
md - The given ModuleData.
Returns:
True if the module has successfully initialized, false otherwise. This method always returns true.

cleanupModule

public void cleanupModule()
This will shutdown the server.

Specified by:

Overrides:
cleanupModule in class DefaultModule

public boolean runDiagnostic(int level,
                             java.io.PrintStream ps)
Returns whether the server is running.

Specified by:

Overrides:
runDiagnostic in class DefaultModule
Parameters:
level - The level of the diagnostic.
ps - The print stream to which messages should be written.
Returns:
true
